item.title: Teleing commads,npc spawning, and object spawing
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:4, topic:137056”] if (command.startsWith("varrock")) { teleportToX = 3213; teleportToY = 3423; }
EDIT: Much easier?[/quote]
Basically the same as red’s, just a minor adjustment…
Use mine, it WORKS.

item.title: Teleing commads,npc spawning, and object spawing
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

I am trying to make teleporting commands like ::varrock and teles you to varrock
And i did do it but when I type ::varrock it doesn’t tele me to varrock…
Do i have to “update my server?”
How would i update it?
This is my first day so don’t make any mean comments please
And If I want to add something like an npc somewhere and after you kill it it would pop up again how would i do that?
And how do I place objects somewhere?Like a dummy…
This is what I did (I don’t know how to do that Code box under it thing)

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“varrock”))
{
teleportToX = 3213;
teleportToY = 3423;
}

Read full topic
